name: Awesome Icon Export
description:
Take control of your iconography! Export your icons in any text-based file format.


⭐️ Now supports variants and component sets! ⭐️


Support

Bugs? Feature requests? Want to say hi? Create an issue on GitHub – or simply leave a comment on this page!


Settings

  • Format: the text-based format to export
  • Frame Prefix: frames starting with this text and variants of component sets with this name will be exported. It is case-sensitive.
  • Filename: the name of the file to be downloaded
  • Sizing: Frame uses the frame as the viewBox in formats that support it, Contents uses the bounding box of everything inside the frame


Custom Formats

Create your own code format using the builtin template editor. Just select "New Custom Format..." from the format options


Reporting Bugs

Create an issue on GitHub. Examples of what info you might include in the issue:

  • Windows or Mac?
  • Does the issue persist after checking for updates and installing any you find?
  • Are you using the Figma desktop app or a browser? If so, which one?
  • General icon setup: in a frame? in a component? strokes & fills? Instances?
  • Any console errors (if you know how to find those)
  • If you are comfortable / able: a public link to or copy of the file in question
